Text: GasEDI Standard ContractEveryone The GST language in the GasEDI Standard Contract is being confirmed by a tax expert We expect this will be complete within the next day or two at which time the GasEDI Standard Contract will be reissued for general use complete with a statement of all changes vs the September version In the meantime I thought you might be interested in the attached article which appeared in the October issue of the Daily Oil Bulletin Have a great day Ian Ian Anderson PEng MBA I S Anderson Associates Limited Business Reengineering Electronic Commerce EDI Avenue SW Calgary Alberta Canada TT B Tel Fax Cell mailto Daily Oil Bulletin Oct pdf

GISB Consideration of the New Gas ContractHi Everyone FYI Ian Ian Anderson PEng MBA I S Anderson Associates Limited Business Reengineering eBusiness eCommerce Avenue SW Calgary Alberta Canada TT B Tel Fax Cell mailto Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday December AM To Subject GISB EC Consideration of the Base Contract Dear EC Members Alternates Contracts Subcommittee Members and EC Meeting Participants We have received several requests to extend the comment period for the consideration of the base contract due to unexpected work load After speaking to the chair of the Contracts Subcommittee and the officers of the EC the comment period is extended to January and while it will be discussed at the EC meeting in December it will not be voted on for adoption until the February EC meeting We hope that this change does not inconvenience you Best Regards GISB Office
